AddGroupMember.document: This API is used to add users to a group.
AddGroupMember.name: Adds users to a group

BatchAddGroupMember.document: This API is used to add users to multiple groups at a time.
BatchAddGroupMember.name: Adds users to multiple groups

BatchCreateGroupWithMembers.document: This API is used to create multiple groups at a time.
BatchCreateGroupWithMembers.name: Creates multiple groups

BatchCreateRoom.document: This API is used to create multiple rooms at a time.
BatchCreateRoom.name: Creates multiple rooms

BatchDeleteGroupMember.document: This API is used to remove users from multiple groups at a time.
BatchDeleteGroupMember.name: Removes users from multiple groups

BatchDeleteRecord.document: This API is used to delete the recordings of multiple rooms.
BatchDeleteRecord.name: Deletes the recordings of multiple rooms

BatchRegister.document: This API is used to register multiple users (up to 1,000) at a time. If a user ID already exists, the existing one will be overwritten.
BatchRegister.name: Registers multiple users

BindDocumentToRoom.document: This API is used to bind a document to a room.
BindDocumentToRoom.name: Binds a document to a room.

CreateDocument.document: This API is used to create a document to be used in a room.
CreateDocument.name: Creates a document.

CreateGroupWithMembers.document: This API is used to create a group and specify its members.
CreateGroupWithMembers.name: Creates a group

CreateGroupWithSubGroup.document: This API is used to merge groups.
CreateGroupWithSubGroup.name: Merges groups

CreateRoom.document: This API is used to create a room.
CreateRoom.name: Creates a room.

CreateSupervisor.document: This API is used to create a spectator.
CreateSupervisor.name: Creates a spectator.

DeleteDocument.document: This API is used to delete a document.
DeleteDocument.name: Deletes a document

DeleteGroup.document: This API is used to delete one or multiple groups.
DeleteGroup.name: Deletes groups

DeleteGroupMember.document: This API is used to remove users from a group.
DeleteGroupMember.name: Removes users from a group

DeleteRecord.document: This example shows you how to delete the recording files of a specific room.
DeleteRecord.name: Deletes the recording files of a specific room

DeleteRoom.document: This API is used to delete a room.
DeleteRoom.name: Deletes a room.

DescribeCurrentMemberList.document: This API is used to get the user list of a room. This API will not work if a room has ended or expired.
DescribeCurrentMemberList.name: Gets the user list of a room

DescribeDocument.document: This API is used to get the information of a specific document.
DescribeDocument.name: Gets the information of a document

DescribeDocumentsByRoom.document: This API is used to get the document list of a specific room.
DescribeDocumentsByRoom.name: Gets the documents of a specific room

DescribeGroup.document: This API is used to get the details of a group.
DescribeGroup.name: Gets the details of a group

DescribeGroupList.document: This API is used to query groups.
DescribeGroupList.name: Queries groups

DescribeGroupMemberList.document: This API is used to get the members of a group.
DescribeGroupMemberList.name: Gets the members of a group

DescribeRoom.document: This API is used to get room information.
DescribeRoom.name: Gets room information.

DescribeRoomStatistics.document: This API is used to obtain the statistics of a room. It can be called only after the room is ended.
DescribeRoomStatistics.name: Obtains the statistics of a room.

DescribeSdkAppIdUsers.document: This API is used to get the user list of a specific application.
DescribeSdkAppIdUsers.name: Gets the user list of an application

DescribeUser.document: This API is used to obtain user profile.
DescribeUser.name: Obtains user profile.

GetWatermark.document: This API is used to get watermark settings.
GetWatermark.name: Gets watermark settings

LoginOriginId.document: This API is used to log in with an origin account, which is the `originId` entered during registration.
LoginOriginId.name: Logs in with an origin account.

LoginUser.document: This API is used to log in.
LoginUser.name: Logs in.

ModifyApp.document: This API is used to modify an application.
ModifyApp.name: Modifies an application.

ModifyGroup.document: This API is used to modify a group.
ModifyGroup.name: Modifies a group

ModifyRoom.document: This API is used to modify a room.
ModifyRoom.name: Modifies a room

ModifyUserProfile.document: This API is used to modify a user profile such as the nickname and profile photo.
ModifyUserProfile.name: Modifies a user profile

RegisterUser.document: This API is used to register a user.
RegisterUser.name: Registers a user.

SetAppCustomContent.document: This API is used to set or update the custom content of an application, including the application icon and custom code. After you update JS and CSS content, you also need to call this API for the updates to take effect.
SetAppCustomContent.name: Sets the custom content of an application.

SetWatermark.document: This API is used to configure watermarks.
SetWatermark.name: Configures watermarks

UnbindDocumentFromRoom.document: This API is used to unbind a document from a room.
UnbindDocumentFromRoom.name: Unbinds a document from a room.

The document access type.
[0]: The private documents of the owner.

Default value: [2].

members.name: RequestId

members.document: The SDKAppID assigned by LCIC.
members.name: SdkAppId

members.document: The URL of the watermark for the teacher’s video. If you pass in an empty string, the teacher’s video will not have a watermark.
members.name: TeacherUrl

members.document: The URL of the watermark for the whiteboard. If you pass in an empty string, the whiteboard video will not have a watermark.
members.name: BoardUrl

members.document: The image displayed when there is no video. If you pass in an empty string, no images will be displayed.
members.name: VideoUrl

members.document: The width of the whiteboard’s watermark, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. The value range is 0-100, and the default value is `0`.
members.name: BoardW

members.document: The height of the whiteboard’s watermark, which is expressed as a percentage of the video height. The value range is 0-100, and the default value is `0`.
members.name: BoardH

members.document: The horizontal offset of the whiteboard’s watermark, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. For example, `50` indicates that the watermark will appear in the middle horizontally. Value range: 0-100.
members.name: BoardX

members.document: The vertical offset of the whiteboard’s watermark, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. For example, `50` indicates that the watermark will appear in the middle vertically. Value range: 0-100.
members.name: BoardY

members.document: The width of the watermark for the teacher’s video, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. The value range is 0-100, and the default value is `0`.
members.name: TeacherW

members.document: The height of the watermark for the teacher’s video, which is expressed as a percentage of the video height. The value range is 0-100, and the default value is `0`.
members.name: TeacherH

members.document: The horizontal offset of the watermark for the teacher’s video, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. For example, `50` indicates that the watermark will appear in the middle horizontally. Value range: 0-100.
members.name: TeacherX

members.document: The vertical offset of the watermark for the teacher’s video, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. For example, `50` indicates that the watermark will appear in the middle vertically. Value range: 0-100.
members.name: TeacherY

members.document: The watermark text. If you pass in an empty string, there will be no text.
members.name: Text

members.document: The watermark text color.
members.name: TextColor

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.

The watermark width, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Width

members.document:
The watermark height, which is expressed as a percentage of the video height.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Height

members.document:
The horizontal offset of the watermark, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. For example, `50` indicates that the watermark will appear in the middle horizontally. Value range: 0-100.	
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: LocationX

members.document:
The vertical offset of the watermark, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. For example, `50` indicates that the watermark will appear in the middle vertically. Value range: 0-100.	
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: LocationY
